forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 7am. Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. Southwest wind 3 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, the remnants of the morning fog dissipate, revealing a day that promises golden rays kissing the cityscape. The sun, a bright and warming presence, works its way through the lingering marine layer, painting the skies a crisp cerulean. The temperatures are set to hover around a comfortable 68 degrees before gradually falling to a gentle 66 by afternoon, creating the perfect backdrop for outdoor pursuits. A mild south-southwest breeze floats through the air, caressing the skin and lending a refreshing quality to the day.

With the clarity of the atmosphere enhancing your surroundings, a leisurely stroll across the Embarcadero could bring you close to the rippling waters of the bay, or perhaps a quiet moment spent in one of the many inviting parks scattered throughout the city. As the evening approaches, maintaining the ease of comfort will be key; a light jacket may be worthwhile as temperatures dip closer to 52, beckoning you to cozy up while enjoying a warm beverage at a nearby café, perfecting the blend of open air and relaxation. Today is one of those golden opportunities to relive the ease of spring in San Francisco, where the fog gives way to sun-soaked moments, urging you to step outside and embrace the urban charm.
